languages.text: "Придурок, кто так держит огнемет? Мы уже почти заправились, сейчас покажем, как надо!"
"Who holds a flamer like that, you idiot? We're almost refuelled here, we'll show you how it's done!"
languages.original_text: "Придурок, кто так держит огнемет? Мы уже почти заправились, сейчас покажем, как надо!"

traits.locale_text: "Who holds a flamer like that, you idiot? We're almost refueled here, we'll show you how it's done!"
"Who holds a flamer like that, you idiot? We're almost refueled here, we'll show you how it's done!"
"Who holds a flamer like that, you idiot? We're almost refuelled here, we'll show you how it's done!"
"Who holds a flamer like that, you idiot? We're almost refuelled here, we'll show you how it's done!"
"Who holds a flamer like that, you idiot? We're almost refuelled here, we'll show you how it's done!"

languages.text: “谁会这么拿火焰喷射器啊，你这个白痴？油马上就快加满了，让我们给你示范一下这东西怎么用吧！”
languages.original_text: "Who holds a flamer like that, you idiot? We're almost refuelled here, we'll show you how it's done!"

traits.locale_text: “谁会这么拿火焰喷射器啊，你这个白痴？油马上就快加满了，让我们给你示范一下这东西怎么用吧！”

languages.text: «¿Quién sujeta un lanzallamas así? ¿Es que eres imbécil? ¡Aquí ya casi hemos repuesto, te vamos a enseñar cómo se hace!».
languages.original_text: "Who holds a flamer like that, you idiot? We're almost refuelled here, we'll show you how it's done!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Quién sujeta un lanzallamas así? ¿Es que eres imbécil? ¡Aquí ya casi hemos repuesto, te vamos a enseñar cómo se hace!».

languages.text: 「バカ、フレイマーをそんな風に使う奴がいるか？あと少しで燃料補給ができる。こう使うんだ、見とけ！」
languages.original_text: "Who holds a flamer like that, you idiot? We're almost refuelled here, we'll show you how it's done!"

traits.locale_text: 「バカ、フレイマーをそんな風に使う奴がいるか？あと少しで燃料補給ができる。こう使うんだ、見とけ！」

languages.text: "Wer hält denn bitte so einen Flammenwerfer? Wir sind hier fast fertig und zeigen Euch, wie's geht!"
languages.original_text: "Who holds a flamer like that, you idiot? We're almost refuelled here, we'll show you how it's done!"

traits.locale_text: "Wer hält denn bitte so einen Flammenwerfer? Wir sind hier fast fertig und zeigen Euch, wie's geht!"

languages.text: « Personne tient son lance-flammes comme ça, espèce d'imbécile ! On a presque fini de faire le plein, on va te montrer comment faut faire ! »
languages.original_text: "Who holds a flamer like that, you idiot? We're almost refuelled here, we'll show you how it's done!"

traits.locale_text: « Personne tient son lance-flammes comme ça, espèce d'imbécile ! On a presque fini de faire le plein, on va te montrer comment faut faire ! »

languages.text: "Alevsaçan öyle tutulur mu ulan mankafa? İkmal işimiz bitti sayılır, sana nasıl yapılırmış gösterelim!"
languages.original_text: "Who holds a flamer like that, you idiot? We're almost refuelled here, we'll show you how it's done!"

traits.locale_text: "Alev silahı öyle tutulur mu ulan mankafa? İkmal işimiz bitti sayılır, sana nasıl yapılırmış gösterelim!"
